name: Dinner Tonight: Thousand Island Dressing
description: Salads tend to be a casual affair. A little bit of whatever is in the fridge, all topped with a simple vinaigrette. But searching for a way to use some big beets, I came across this old-school recipe for Thousand...

recipeInstructions.text: Combine all the ingredients except the salt and pepper in a large bowl and gently fold together with plastic spatula until the dressing turns a light orange or pink. Then season with salt and pepper to taste.
